DOC.brief_title: Effects of Heating Transfusion on Brain Function
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothermia is an effective therapeutic intervention to reduce hypoxic ischemia brain injury in animal experiments and in clinics.In a recent study, it has been shown that perioperative warming was associated with a higher incidence of cognitive dysfunction in elderly patients.Therefore, we hypothesised that perioperative heating transfusion have a side effect on brain function of surgical patients.
